item.title: Untitled
item.description:
• Practical Characterization of Large Networks Using Neighborhood Information.
    arXiv:1311.3037 (2013).
  • Tracking Triadic Cardinality Distributions for Burst Detection in Social Activity Streams.
    arXiv:1411.3308 (2015).
    • An updated version with same title is accepted by COSN 2015.
  • Design of Efficient Sampling Methods on Hybrid Social-Affiliation Networks.
    arXiv:1405.5097 (2014).
    • An updated version titled "A Tale of Three Graphs: Sampling Design on Hybrid Social-Affiliation Networks" is accepted by ICDE 2015.
  • Social Sensor Placement in Large Scale Networks: A Graph Sampling Perspective.
    arXiv:1305.6489 (2013).
    • An updated version titled "WTF: Efficient Followee Selection for Cascading Outbreak Detection on Online Social Networks" is accepted by Computer Networks 2014.
  • On Analyzing Estimation Errors due to Constraint Connections in Online Review Systems.
    arXiv:1307.3687 (2013).
    • A two-page short paper with the same title is accepted by CrowdRec 2013.
  • A Peep at the Interplays between Online Video Websites and Online Social Networks.
    arXiv:1305.4018 (2013).

item.title: Awards
item.description:
Awards

  • Best Paper Award, RecSys 2017
  • Featured Article, IEEE Internet Computing, 2014
  • Best Paper Award, SIMPLEX Workshop (co-located with WWW), 2014

item.title: Untitled
item.description:
• MOSS-5: A Fast Method of Approximating Counts of 5-Node Graphlets in Large Graphs.
    P. Wang, J. Zhao, X. Zhang, Z. Li, J. Cheng, J. Lui, D. Towsley, J. Tao, and X. Guan.
    IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE), 2018.
  • Inferring Higher-Order Structure Statistics of Large Networks From Sampled Edges.
    P. Wang, Y. Qi, J. Lui, D. Towsley, J. Zhao, J. Tao.
    IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE), 2017.
  • Modeling the Assimilation-Contrast Effects in Online Product Rating Systems: Debiasing and Recommendations.
    X. Zhang, J. Zhao, and J. Lui.
    In proceedings of ACM RecSys, 2017.
    [Awarded Best Paper]
  • I/O-Efficient Calculation of Group Closeness Centrality over Disk-Resident Graphs.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, P. Wang, and X. G.
    Information Sciences, 2017.
  • Minfer: A Method of Inferring Motif Statistics from Sampled Edges.
    P. Wang, J. Lui, D. Towsley, and J. Zhao.
    In proceedings of the 32nd IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), 2016.
  • Structure Measurement and Behavior Monitoring for Complex Online Social Networks.
    J. Zhao.
    Ph.D. thesis, Xi'an Jiaotong University, 2015.
  • Tracking Triadic Cardinality Distributions for Burst Detection in Social Activity Streams.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, P. Wang, and X. G.
    In proceedings of the ACM Conference on Online Social Networks (COSN), 2015.
    [arXiv]
  • A Tale of Three Graphs: Sampling Design on Hybrid Social-Affiliation Networks.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, P. Wang, and X. G.
    In proceedings of the 31st IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), 2015.
    [arXiv (old version)]
  • A New Sketch Method for Measuring Host Connection Degree Distribution.
    P. Wang, X. Guang, J. Zhao, J. Tao, and T. Qin.
    IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security, 9(6), 2014.
  • Measuring and Maximizing Group Closeness Centrality over Disk-Resident Graphs.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, and X. G.
    In proceedings of the 6th Annual Workshop on Simplifying Complex Networks for Practitioners (SIMPLEX, co-located with WWW), 2014.
    [Awarded Best Paper]
  • WTF: Efficient Followee Selection for Cascading Outbreak Detection on Online Social Networks.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, and X. G.
    Computer Networks, Special Issue on Online Social Networks, 2014.
  • Unbiased Characterization of Node Pairs over Large Graphs.
    P. Wang, J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, and X. G.
    ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data (TKDD), 2014.
  • A Tale of Three Social Networks: User Activity Comparations across Facebook, Twitter, and Foursquare.
    P. Wang, W. He, and J. Zhao.
    IEEE Internet Computing, 2014.
    [Featured Article by STCSN]
  • Efficiently Estimating Motif Statistics of Large Networks.
    P. Wang, J. Lui, B. Ribeiro, D. Towsley, J. Zhao, and X. G.
    ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery form Data (TKDD), 2014.
    [arXiv]
  • On Analyzing Estimation Errors due to Constrained Connections in Online Review Systems.
    J. Zhao, X. G, and J. Tao.
    In the Workshop on Crowdsourcing and Human Computation for Recommender Systems (CrowdRec, co-located with RecSys), 2013.
    [arXiv]
  • Sampling Node Pairs Over Large Graphs.
    P. Wang, J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, and X. G.
    In proceedings of the 29th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE), 2013.
  • Empirical Analysis of the Evolution of Follower Network: A Case Study on Douban.
    J. Zhao, J. Lui, D. Towsley, X. G, and Y. Z.
    In the 3rd International Workshop on Network Science for Communication Networks (NetSciCom, co-located with INFOCOM), 2011.
  • A Peep at Pornography Web in China.
    Z. Wu, L. Jiang, Z. Tian, J. Liu, and J. Zhao.
    In the 2nd Web Science Conference (WebSci, co-located with WWW), 2010.
    [Media]
